name: Twilight Tattoo
description: You have a special tattoo that identifies you as a Twilight Talon when you speak a designated command word.
prerequisites: Wis 13, affiliated with the Twilight Talons
benefit: You gain an invisible magical tattoo that identifies you as a member of the Twilight Talons. When you speak the command word, the tattoo becomes visible for 1 round before fading again. The tattoo has no magical aura when not visible and is not an illusion; it canâ€™t be observed through magical means. (The command word causes the tattoo to manifest rather than ending the magic concealing it.)
